attributes.action: Allow all Ghurka ex-serviceman and their families the right to reside in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely it is morally wrong to deny any Ghurka ex-servicemen or women the right to reside in the UK while we allow criminal elements from Eastern Europe, Asia and Africa to reside here, even after committing serious criminal acts against Britain and the British and being prosecuted for them. The Ghurkas have spent their lives and the lives of previous generations in the protection of the British Crown and people. Let them stay - they are good people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
